Services

U.K.-wide, decision-ready site reality. Every visit delivers clear visuals, accurate as-builts, and practical recommendations you can use immediately for design, budgeting, and approvals.

As-Built Site Reality Visit

Core service

One visit to capture how the space actually is today.

When you use it

  • New leases and renewals
  • Renovations, tenant improvements, change-of-use
  • Early test-fits and budgeting

What you receive

  • Digital twin you can walk through remotely
  • Photo storyboard of shell, core, MEP, ceilings, floors, and issues
  • Key dimensions & counts (bays, doors, windows, washrooms, sprinklers, diffusers, lights, etc.)
  • A detailed written conditions report with fixture counts and a high-level mechanical / services overview, clearly highlighting both upside opportunities and concerns, prioritised into P1 / P2 / P3 so you know what to act on first.

All outputs are generated from structured field data captured using ScopeWalk™.

Construction Progress Visit

Progress monitoring

Independent eyes on your build, with photos and notes that track against the programme and pay app.

When you use it

  • Fit-outs and renovations in progress
  • Verifying GC draw requests and change orders
  • Hand-over readiness checks

What you receive

  • Fixed-route photo set for consistent, repeatable coverage
  • Progress notes by area (what’s complete, behind, or missing)
  • Exceptions / issues log with simple risk tags and suggested next steps
  • A concise progress report that ties photos back to programme, pay applications, and change orders, calling out risks, re-work exposure, and potential savings.
  • Optional narrated walkthrough clip for remote stakeholders

All outputs are generated from structured field data captured using ScopeWalk™.

Portfolio & Lease Diligence Visit

Multi-site

Quick, consistent reality checks when you’re comparing buildings or locations.

When you use it

  • Shortlisting buildings across multiple markets
  • Renew vs. relocate decisions
  • Pre-acquisition or pre-funding site checks

What you receive

  • Comparable digital twin + photo set for each site
  • Suitability summary: good fit / workable / problematic
  • Call-outs on access, loading, parking, visibility, neighbours, and local quirks
  • A comparative diligence summary that highlights key upsides, constraints, and hidden costs by site, so your team can line them up like-for-like and move quickly.
  • "Red flag" list for anything likely to delay design, permitting, or opening
  • Side-by-side summary table for shortlisted sites

All outputs are generated from structured field data captured using ScopeWalk™.

Stakeholder Walkthrough & Trade Day

On-site representation

A professional on-site representative to align brokers, clients, landlords, and trades around the same scope, budget, and reality.

When you use it

  • Broker and client walkthroughs where decisions need to be made in the space
  • Trade days to obtain accurate pricing and clarify scope
  • When senior client stakeholders can’t travel but still need a trusted “face” on site

What you receive

  • Hosted walkthrough with brokers, client reps, landlords, and/or GC & key trades
  • Live clarification of structural, services, access, and base-build issues
  • Field budget alignment and sanity checks on early pricing
  • A concise follow-up note summarising who attended, key agreements, open questions, and any major cost risks or savings opportunities.

All outputs are generated from structured field data captured using ScopeWalk™.

Drone Photo & Video Layer

Add-on

Aerial context for roofs, sites, and surroundings – as an add-on to any visit.

How it works

  • Added to any standard site visit (where local rules & weather allow)
  • Focused set of aerial photos and short video clips
  • Not survey-grade mapping – purely visual, high-quality context

What you receive

  • High-resolution stills of roof condition, equipment, drainage paths
  • Wide views of parking, access roads, loading, and neighbouring uses
  • Short raw video clips for internal updates or investor/board decks

All outputs are generated from structured field data captured using ScopeWalk™.

Note: This is a visual photo/video service; U.K. drone regulations apply and flights are weather/airspace dependent.

Ready to move a site forward?

Tell us where the building is, what decision you’re trying to make, and how fast you need an answer. We’ll recommend the right visit type and send a simple, all-in quote.
